text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.C.DE51Not on ARTSex partner's HIV treatment status - Not on ART
    HIV.C.DE52On ART less than 6 monthsSex partner's HIV treatment status - On ART less than 6 months
    HIV.C.DE53Partner has suspected low adherence to ARTSex partner's HIV treatment status - Partner has suspected low adherence to ART
    HIV.C.DE54Partner is not virally suppressedSex partner's HIV treatment status - Partner is not virally suppressed
    HIV.C.DE55Partner is virally suppressed and has been on ART for 6 months or moreSex partner's HIV treatment status - Partner is virally suppressed and has been on ART for 6 months or more

name: Sexpartner'sHIVtreatmentstatusCodes
title: Sex partner's HIV treatment status Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Sex partner's HIV treatment status element

concept.display: Partner has suspected low adherence to ART
Partner is virally suppressed and has been on ART for 6 months or more
